snippet.title: Mechanica Trailer
snippet.description:
The first official trailer for Mechanica.

Mechanica store page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1226990/Mechanica/

Mechanica is an upcoming open-world building game with survival and defensive elements. It's most important feature is it's visual programming system. This system allows the player to build and program advanced defensive, manufacturing, and other automated machines and systems.

Mechanica is currently under development and is expected to release in February 2020.

For more info on Mechanica's development:
https://www.deimosinteractive.com/blog
